requirements.summary: Replace the existing Aegis Sovereign logo with new logo design across all application instances including landing page header, dashboard sidebar, PWA manifest icons, and favicon
acceptanceCriteria: New logo appears in the landing page header navigation
New logo displays in the collapsed and expanded sidebar states in DashboardLayout
PWA manifest icons are updated with the new logo design
Logo maintains visual consistency across all screen sizes and contexts

file_operations.description: Replace the existing logo in the header navigation with the new logo image located at frontend/public/assets/generated/aegis-logo.dim_256x256.png. Update the img src to reference the generated logo asset and ensure proper alt text and sizing for the header context.

Replace the existing logo in both the collapsed and expanded sidebar states with the new logo image located at frontend/public/assets/generated/aegis-logo.dim_256x256.png. Ensure the logo displays correctly in both sidebar states while maintaining the existing glassmorphism styling and layout positioning.

Update the icons array to reference the new PWA icon assets: frontend/public/assets/generated/aegis-icon-192.dim_192x192.png for the 192x192 icon and frontend/public/assets/generated/aegis-icon-512.dim_512x512.png for the 512x512 icon. Preserve the existing manifest structure and only update the icon src paths and sizes.

Update the favicon link tag to reference the new favicon located at frontend/public/assets/generated/aegis-favicon.dim_32x32.png. Ensure the link rel attribute is set to 'icon' and the type is 'image/png' with appropriate sizes attribute.
